title: Reserva Cine
description: This is a project to learn Django, SQL Server and Bootstrap using async functions to insert, update, delete and select data from the database. See more on Github readme

title: Discord Music Bot
description: This project is a discord bot to listen to music with friends on a server. To create this bot I used python with the discord.py library. See more on Github readme.

title: Data Analysis CityBike
description: This project is my first steps in data analysis using python with the citybike dataset. Using pandas to handle the data, matplotlib to plot the data. See more on Github readme.

title: Flask Website
description: The purpose of this project is to demonstrate how to set up a Flask development environment and create a simple web application. It includes basic examples of routing, templating and form handling. See more on Github readme.

title: DataMining-MachineLearning
description: This project contains a collection of algorithms and techniques used in data mining and machine learning. The main goal is to provide various methods, as well as practical examples of their application. See more on Github readme.
